title: Historically Black Colleges and Universities — Undergraduate Program (HBCU‑UP)
eligibility: HBCUs as lead institutions; partnerships encouraged
description: HBCU‑UP supports Implementation, Targeted Infusion, Research Initiation Awards, and BPR Centers with FY 2024–2025 funding. Estimated award sizes vary by track.

title: MUREP Aeronautics Community Engagement Impact Research (ACEIR) 2.0
description: Funding opportunity focused on aeronautics community engagement research with MSI leadership and participation.

title: NIH Guide for Grants and Contracts — Weekly Index
description: Weekly roundup of NIH funding opportunity announcements and notices; subscribe via RSS to monitor updates in real time.
